1.goal: Propose a Constitutional Amendment to impose term limits on all members of Congress

2.goal: A hiring freeze on all federal employees to reduce federal workforce through attrition (exempting military, public safety, and public health)

3.goal: A requirement that for every new federal regulation, two existing regulations must be eliminated

4.goal: A 5 year-ban on White House and Congressional officials becoming lobbyists after they leave government service

5.goal: A lifetime ban on White House officials lobbying on behalf of a foreign government

6.goal: A complete ban on foreign lobbyists raising money for American elections

7.goal: Renegotiate NAFTA or withdraw from the deal under Article 2205

9.goal: Direct my Secretary of the Treasury to label China a currency manipulator

10.goal: Direct the Secretary of Commerce and U.S. Trade Representative to identify all foreign trading abuses that unfairly impact American workers and direct them to use every tool under American and international law to end those abuses immediately

11.goal: Lift the restrictions on the production of $50 trillion dollars' worth of job-producing American energy reserves, including shale, oil, natural gas and clean coal.

12.goal: lift the Obama-Clinton roadblocks and allow vital energy infrastructure projects, like the Keystone Pipeline, to move forward

13.goal: cancel billions in payments to U.N. climate change programs and use the money to fix America's water and environmental infrastructure

14.goal: cancel every unconstitutional executive action, memorandum and order issued by President Obama

15.goal: begin the process of selecting a replacement for Justice Scalia from one of the 20 judges on my list, who will uphold and defend the Constitution of the United States

16.goal: cancel all federal funding to Sanctuary Cities

17.goal: begin removing the more than 2 million criminal illegal immigrants from the country and cancel visas to foreign countries that won't take them back

18.goal: suspend immigration from terror-prone regions where vetting cannot safely occur. All vetting of people coming into our country will be considered extreme vetting.

19.goal: Middle Class Tax Relief And Simplification Act.

22.goal: School Choice And Education Opportunity Act

28.goal: Clean up Corruption in Washington Act
